mean_en: a person who pays money, usually once a year, to receive regular copies of a magazine or newspaper; a person who gives money regularly to help the work of an organization such as a charity
sentence: He is a subscriber to the Daily News and receives messages every morning.
sentence_trans: 他是《每日新闻》的订阅者，每天早上都会收到消息。
word_etyma: subscrib订阅 + er名词后缀：人 → subscriber订阅者，订户
